title: Litro to resume distribution on Tuesday (31) Check Availability
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Litro Gas company states that the distribution of 50,0000 domestic LP Gas cylinders of 12.5 kg, 5kg and 2.3kg will resume tomorrow (31) afternoon.
The dealer list for stock availability can be accessed via  www.litrogas.com .
World Bank to disburse USD 700Mn to Sri Lanka, Country Director disagrees
